# LOAD DATA
```{r echo=FALSE, results='hide', message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
result_path = "../results/"

read.al <- function(path) {
  df <- read.csv(path, sep=",",header=T, dec=".")
  return (df)
}
piloto1 = read.al(paste(result_path, "piloto1.csv", sep=""))
piloto1$response_time = piloto$response_time / 1000000
piloto1$service_time = (piloto$tsafter - piloto$tsbefore) / 1000000

require(dplyr) 
no_cold_start_all = filter(
  rbind(
    read.al(paste(result_path, "input01.csv", sep="")),
    read.al(paste(result_path, "input02.csv", sep="")),
    read.al(paste(result_path, "input03.csv", sep="")),
    read.al(paste(result_path, "input04.csv", sep="")),
    read.al(paste(result_path, "input05.csv", sep="")),
    read.al(paste(result_path, "input06.csv", sep="")),
    read.al(paste(result_path, "input07.csv", sep="")),
    read.al(paste(result_path, "input08.csv", sep="")),
    read.al(paste(result_path, "input09.csv", sep="")),
    read.al(paste(result_path, "input10.csv", sep="")),
    read.al(paste(result_path, "input11.csv", sep="")),
    read.al(paste(result_path, "input12.csv", sep="")),
    read.al(paste(result_path, "input13.csv", sep="")),
    read.al(paste(result_path, "input14.csv", sep="")),
    read.al(paste(result_path, "input15.csv", sep="")),
    read.al(paste(result_path, "input16.csv", sep=""))
    ), id != 1)

mean(no_cold_start_all$response_time) / 1000000
```
